name: Implicit function
author: Kanata
description:
Graph of a third-degree polynomial implicit function.
Tweak the coefficients a~j and enjoy how it changes.
image_code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 res = iResolution.xy,
          uv = ( u* 2. - res) / min(res.x, res.y);

    float t = iTime,
          x = uv.x,
          y = uv.y,

          a = 1.,
          b = 1.,
          c = 1.,
          d = 1.,
          e = sin(.5* t),
          f = sin(.6* t),
          g = sin(.7* t),
          h = sin(.8* t),
          i = sin(.9* t),
          j = sin(1.* t),

          p = a* x* x* x + b* x* x* y + c* x* y* y + d* y* y* y+
                   e* x* x + f* x* y + g* y* y + h* x + i* y + j;

    O = vec4( .05 / abs(p) );
}

name: ZzArt 2 - Generative Abstract
author: KilledByAPixel
description: Evolved using zzart.3d2k.com
image_code:
void mainImage(out vec4 a, vec2 p) {
    vec2 q=p/iResolution.xy;\
    a=vec4(2.28*q-4.3,3.53*q-7.67);\
    a=cos(a.yywx*a.yyxz+iTime*1.57);\
    a-=exp2(a.wyxy);\
    vec4 b=(a.wyzy+a.yyzw)*sign(a.y);\
    a/=vec2(.88,.42).yyxy;\
    a/=a.xzxx;\
    a+=b.zzww-normalize(b.yxyw)-log2(b.wwxx);\
    b=clamp(abs(mod(3.71-.9*a.x+vec4(0,4,2,1),6.)-3.)-1.,0.,1.);\
    a=a.z*mix(vec4(1),b*b*(3.-2.*b),a.y/8.);}
